BIO

Edwin Allen High School was named after the first Minister of Education of independent Jamaica. Edwin Allen is a very large high school of more than 2,000 students. Jermaine Harris is the principal of Edwin Allen High School. Transeamus in Exemplum WE SHALL BE AN EXAMPLE.
